content:
I apologize, but I think there might be some confusion. There are many cities with an "Art Museum" or a museum with a similar name, so it's difficult for me to pinpoint the exact one without more information.

Could you please provide more context or details about your city, such as:

* The state or country you're in
* A nearby landmark or popular attraction
* The city's size (e.g., large metropolitan area, small town, etc.)

This will help me narrow down the possibilities and try to find the City Art Museum you're referring to.

Alternatively, you can also try searching online for "art museums in [your city/state]" or check websites like TripAdvisor or Google Maps to find art museums in your area. Then, you can check their websites to see if they have any Monet's Water Lilies series or similar exhibits.

Let me know if there's anything else I can do to help!
